trans-unit.source: Displays an image on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在網頁上顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The Image control lets you work with images from server code.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [協助工具](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介︰ 影像控制項可讓您使用映像從伺服端程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the Image control to display any valid image supported by the requesting browser on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用影像控制項來顯示支援要求的瀏覽器，在網頁上的任何有效的映像。

trans-unit.source: The path to the displayed image is specified by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 顯示映像的路徑設定，來指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify the text to display in place of image when the image is not available by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定要顯示影像取代影像無法使用時所設定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page is specified by setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定來指定相對於在網頁上的其他項目影像的對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageAlign%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This control only displays an image.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個控制項只會顯示映像。

trans-unit.source: If you need to capture mouse clicks on the image, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要擷取的映像上按一下滑鼠按鍵時，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Adds the attributes of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> to the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 新增的屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref>至用戶端上呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client browser.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，其中包含用戶端瀏覽器上呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> control when the image is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中顯示的替代文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref>控制映像無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 支援工具提示功能的瀏覽器會將這個文字顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property is not available.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示如果映像中指定的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性會無法使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also displays as a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器支援工具提示功能，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The alternate text displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> control when the image is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 在顯示的替代文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref>控制映像無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location to a detailed description for the image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定位置之映像的詳細說明。

trans-unit.source: The DescriptionUrl property specifies an HTML file that provides additional details for the image.
trans-unit.target: DescriptionUrl 屬性指定的 HTML 檔案，提供映像的其他詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: The DescriptionUrl property renders as the `longdesc` attribute for the image control.
trans-unit.target: DescriptionUrl 屬性轉譯成`longdesc`影像控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the DescriptionUrl property is not set, or is set to an empty string (""), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control renders without the `longdesc` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果 DescriptionUrl 屬性未設定，或設為空字串 ("")，則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項呈現不含`longdesc`屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: Use the DescriptionUrl property to supplement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DescriptionUrl 屬性，以補充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control to display an image of the solar system, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property to `The Solar System,` and then set the DescriptionUrl property to an HTML page that further describes the image of planets orbiting the sun in the solar system.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項來顯示太陽系的映像，您可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>屬性`The Solar System,`然後將 DescriptionUrl 屬性設定為進一步描述這顆恆太陽系中的 sun 行星的映像的 HTML 網頁。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: The DescriptionUrl property is optional, but it can enhance the accessibility of your Web page for text-only browsers and screen readers.
trans-unit.target: DescriptionUrl 屬性是選擇性的但它可以增強網頁純文字的瀏覽器和螢幕助讀程式的存取範圍。

trans-unit.source: Browsers can use the detailed text description to convey important concepts in place of, or in addition to, the visual image.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器可以使用詳細的文字描述，來傳達重要的概念，取代，或是加視覺影像。

trans-unit.source: Refer to your browser documentation for details on how it uses the descriptive content specified by the `longdesc` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 您的瀏覽器文件，其使用方式描述所指定的內容的詳細資訊，請參閱`longdesc`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The URL for the file that contains a detailed description for the image.
trans-unit.target: 包含影像的詳細的描述檔案的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已啟用。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the font properties for the text associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與控制項相關聯的文字的字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"></xref> that contains the properties for the text associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo"> </xref>包含文字與控制項關聯的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control generates an alternate text attribute for an empty string value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否產生空白的字串值的替代文字屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate text in the control rendering.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>未設定屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項不包含`alt`屬性來指定替代文字控制項的呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.AlternateText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the GenerateEmptyAlternateText property to `true` to always include the alternate text attribute in rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control.
trans-unit.target: 將 GenerateEmptyAlternateText 屬性設定為`true`永遠轉譯輸出中包含的替代文字屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 文件類型定義需要`alt`影像控制項上的屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 不過，協助工具最佳作法建議並不會傳遞網頁的內容相關的資訊的影像控制項不應該指定`alt`屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the GenerateEmptyAlternateText property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 GenerateEmptyAlternateText 屬性設定為符合 XHTML 和協助工具需求`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control generates the alternate text attribute for an empty string value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項產生空白的字串值; 的替代文字屬性否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的對齊<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref>相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageAlign property to specify or determine the alignment of the image in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ImageAlign 屬性來指定，或決定相對於在網頁上的其他項目影像的對齊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible alignments.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: |Alignment|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|The alignment is not set.| |`Left`|The image is aligned on the left edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the right.| |`Right`|The image is aligned on the right edge of the Web page with text wrapping on the left.| |`Baseline`|The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Top`|The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest element on the same line.| |`Middle`|The middle of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`Bottom`|The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the first line of text.| |`AbsBottom`|The lower edge of the image is aligned with the lower edge of the largest element on the same line.| |`AbsMiddle`|The middle of the image is aligned with the middle of the largest element on the same line.| |`TextTop`|The upper edge of the image is aligned with the upper edge of the highest text on the same line.|
trans-unit.target: |對齊 |描述 | |---------------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定對齊方式。 | |`Left`|影像對齊 Web 頁面的左邊緣右側的文字換行。 | |`Right`|影像對齊網頁的右邊緣左側的文字換行。 | |`Baseline`|映像的較低的邊緣對齊文字的第一行的下邊緣。 | |`Top`|映像的上邊緣與最高的項目，在同一行上的上邊緣對齊。 | |`Middle`|第一行文字的下邊緣與對齊影像的中間。 | |`Bottom`|映像的較低的邊緣對齊文字的第一行的下邊緣。 | |`AbsBottom`|映像的上邊緣與最大的項目，在同一行上的下邊緣對齊。 | |`AbsMiddle`|中間影像的對齊與最大的項目，在同一行中間。 | |`TextTop`|映像的上邊緣與最高的同一行上文字的上邊緣對齊。 |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL that provides the path to an image to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供的路徑中所顯示之影像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"> </xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageUrl property to specify the URL of an image to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ImageUrl 屬性來指定要在中顯示的影像 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can use a relative or an absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server.
trans-unit.target: 相對的 URL 相關的網頁位置之影像的位置不在伺服器上指定完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path is relative to the location of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 路徑是相對於網頁上的位置。

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the code.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您容易到另一個目錄移動整個站台伺服器上而不更新程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code.
trans-unit.target: 絕對 URL 會提供的完整路徑，所以移動到另一個目錄的站台需要您更新程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The URL that provides the path to an image to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供的路徑中所顯示之影像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image"> </xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Renders the image control contents to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的寫入器呈現影像控制項內容。

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents method is primarily used by control developers.
trans-unit.target: RenderContents 方法主要是由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control implements the RenderContents method to skip rendering of any child controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制項實作 RenderContents 方法，以略過任何子控制項的呈現。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否應該設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref>屬性來呈現之 HTML 項目的"disabled"當控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於`4.0`，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
